name: Through The Darkness (sininenblue)
description:
A short adventure through the caves and ruins of old.

Be careful though, as the darkness in these ruins hold a mysterious and deadly power only being held back by the lights your predecessors have left.

This was made for the weekly game jam 152 with the theme shelter

Didn't really know how to use the theme but I wanted to try and make a game with better graphics and atmosphere so this was the result. Was very proud of my tiles since it's the first time I made good looking ones

Music: The Gift of Sight by Peter Gundry
